paper.title: The resolution program, able to decide some solvable classes
paper.venue: COLOG '88 Proceedings of the International Conference on Computer Logic
paper.abstract: In the first part of the paper we describe our theorem-prover implementing a certain modification of the resolution strategy of N.Zamov. Zamovu0027s strategy decides a number of solvable classes, including Maslovu0027s Class K (this class contains most well-known decidable classes like Godelu0027s Class, Skolemu0027s Class, Monadic Class). We describe several experiments performed with the theorem-prover.
